channel.title: Npc safe ring will rep ++
channel.description:
can anyone help me with a ring that npcs cant attack you only on a certain island and you cant attack npcs so there is an island and you can pk there witch makes it harder to get the good drops the monsters drop please help
so basicallt i want it so npcs are non agressive(only when wereing the ring) and you cant attack npcs but this all only happens on a certain island
317 delta or pi i can convert most codes
